title: Grandco Women's 25551E Mystical Slide Beaded Waterproof Molded Sole Summer Sandals, Black, 11
features: EXCELLENT CHOICE - Mystical by Grandco Sandal is a marble multicoloured beaded sandal with a burst glitter on the stones and silver accent beading
LAY FLAT DECORATIONS - Jeweled stones and beads lay flat against your foot, so you needn't worry about comfort and can wear them at home instead of slippers
WATERPROOF MOLDED SOLE - These comfortable sandals feature a 1" molded PVC waterproof sole which will offer you extra arch support
EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE - These versatile light sandals not only look stylish but are comfortable, allowing you to wear them for extended periods without cries of pain
EASY TO MAINTAIN - The Grandco Mystical Sandals are easy to maintain because of the quality materials and fabric used in manufacturing
description: Mystical Sandals have a textured color inner sole adding a little glam to complete your look. Grandcos make an excellent choice for spring, summer, and even fall, coordinating with almost anything in your closet.Want to feel like you are walking on air, then you need to try these shoes today.
- Extremely comfortable - Molded sole for extra comfort - Stones lay flat against your foot - Perfect throughout the summer

The length of shoe heel to toe (at longest point) is approximately. All sizing is US standard sizing in whole sizes only; if you are a half size, you should order next size up.
